profile.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on 'Designing and Coding outstanding Digital Hosts' and 'implement improvements to our platform', which are core software engineering tasks (Macro-Category A). While it mentions implementing and applying LLMs & AI-based technologies, the emphasis is on integrating these into a product rather than deep model development or specialization. The tasks lean towards building and integrating AI-powered features into software, fitting the 'AI-Adjacent Software Engineer' profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines software development tasks and mentions AI/LLM integration. The profile assignment is straightforward based on the balance of tasks. However, the specific AI tasks are not deeply detailed, preventing a perfect score.
